Beach dreams in the Caribbean

Ideally located on the azure shores of the Caribbean, you're guaranteed to leave the El Caribeño relaxed and sun-kissed. Our luxury hotel caters to your every need with 24 hour room service, a spa and even a private beach for our guests. Whether you're here on a romantic getaway or exploring the beautiful Caribbean with family, we guarantee that El Caribeño has something for everyone.
